title: igus designs ReBeLMove modular mobile robot, new energy chain
description:
igus continues its drive for efficiency with a customizable AMR, the E1 one-piece energy chain, and expanded U.S. production.

The post igus designs ReBeLMove modular mobile robot, new energy chain appeared first on The Robot Report.
